text: Bella Dayne (born 1987 or 1988) is a German actress. Her credits include the television series Plebs, Humans and the BBC/Netflix miniseries Troy: Fall of a City, in which she portrayed Helen of Troy. In 2020 she was cast for the role of Red Spear in the Netflix original show Cursed. == Early life and career == Dayne was born as Isabelle Knispel in Berlin, where she was raised as well. In 2006 while still being in school she won the Miss Germany competition.MISS GERMANY: „Das ist wie Talentsichtung“. Frankfurter Allgemeine, 5 February 2006 After that she moved to New York City, attending the Stella Adler Studio of Acting. Dayne has also lived in Los Angeles, where she worked three jobs. For her acting career she chose Bella Dayne as a stage name. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Year ! Title !
